## Checklist
- [ ] I ran `npm run build` locally and it succeeded
- [ ] I ran `npm run lint` and fixed all issues
- [ ] I added tests where applicable
- [ ] I updated documentation (docs/features/*.md if applicable)
- [ ] My code follows the existing code style and patterns
- [ ] I have reviewed my own code
- [ ] CI checks are passing
